name: Keep the Lights On!
description: Keep the Lights On! is a linear story-driven first-person horror experience. The story takes place in an idyllic small cabin in the cold deep woods of Finland. The game begins as you arrive at the cabin vacation weekend you won from a contest with your friends.

description:
Raise adorable pets in Petadachi. ​Explore with your pet. Play with your pet. Care for your pet. Love your pet.
Learn your pet's unique likes and dislikes. Go fishing with your pet. Shop for items. Search for items in tall grass.
There's so much to discover in Petadachi.

name: Wakfu: Ouginak Pack
description: The Ouginak Pack includes 30 days of God Booster, the Tracker Costume, the Ouginak Haven Bag Kit and an Exceptional Artipotion.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Emperor’s Elite Pack
description: Renowned crusaders against the enemies of humanity, the BLACK TEMPLARS eschew the idea of a home world. Instead, they have taken to the stars in mighty crusade fleets, actively seeking out the enemy throughout the Galaxy.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Death Guard Champion Chapter Pack DLC
description: Corrupted and swollen by the pestilences and plagues that afflict them Death Guard Champions prefer short ranged combat where they can spread the diseases that the Chaos God Nurgle has blessed them with. Immune to pain or damage they grimly advance forward laughing off attacks and leaving a trail of pestilence and disease behind them.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Traitor Legions Pack
description: The emperor's children Legion betrayed their figurative father -- the Emperor of Man -- some ten thousand years ago, during the Horus Heresy. The Legion fell to the perverse temptations of the Chaos God Slaanesh, becoming addicted to the sensations of battle and conquest. They have served the Prince of Excess ever since.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Eternal Crusade - Belial War Pack
description: Will you hear his call and be a loyal servant of the Emperor? If you do, then why not stand out in the middle of melee with the Belial War Pack? It includes the Champion weapon and armour pack (for the Space Marine faction) and 10,000 RTCs to customize your warrior furthermore.

name: Phantasy Star Online 2: Helga Pack
description: A special pack containing a 200 SG Ticket and collaboration items from Phantasy Star Universe, for one-time purchase only. Purchase this pack to obtain an outfit that will let you become Helga Neumann from the Phantasy Star Universe series.

name: Phantasy Star Online 2: Howzer Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Phantasy Star Online 2: Vivienne Pack
description: Get in-game items exclusive to Phantasy Star Online 2 through this pack. A special pack containing a 200 SG Ticket and collaboration items from Phantasy Star Universe, for one-time purchase only. Purchase this pack to obtain an outfit that will let you become Vivienne from the Phantasy Star Universe series.

name: Children's Jigsaw Puzzles: Beautifully Illustrated - Expansion Pack
description: This puzzle game helps your kids develop matching and fine motor skills. Your children will just love these wonderfully hand-drawn pictures and will improve their spatial skills while having fun!

name: Chrono's Arena: Characters Pack
description: Bored with the same four characters? Don't want to play hours to acquire all the characters? This pack is for you. This Character Pack includes 10 characters that will bring you 80 more skills to enter the Arena!

name: Battlestar Galactica Deadlock: Modern Ships Pack
description: From the behemoth Mercury class battlestar, to the iconic Modern Basestar, this ship pack contains six ships of the modern era of Battlestar Galactica.

name: Battlerite Royale: Legendary Adventure Pack Vol.2
description: The Legendary Adventure Pack Volume 2 contains another pack of gear you'll want to take to Talon Island, with a new Mount to carry you into the fight!

name: Battlerite Royale: Legendary Adventure Pack
description: There’s an entire world to see - you need the right gear for the journey! The Legendary Adventure Pack contains everything you need for your travels - six Legendary Outfits, three Royale Chests, and the exclusive Baby Storm Wyvern Mount to fly around the Battlerite world upon.

name: Battle of Empires : 1914-1918 - Victory Pack
description: This free DLC includes the "Battle for Berlin" multiplayer mission.

name: Battle for the Galaxy: Ice Bastion Pack
description: This DLC includes additional content which will become available in-game after purchase and make your space outpost a lot stronger!

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.3 Challenge Quest: Linking Light's Successor EX
description: Description: Adds a bonus challenge quest featuring an enhanced version of the boss encounter from Linking Light's Successor. This quest does not include any story content.

name: Adventure Academia: The Fractured Continent - Vol.3 Bonus Unit: Lapis
description: Description: Adds Lapis, a main character from the storyline, into the game as a playable character.

name: Ookeenga
description:
The gameplay of Ookeenga is a combination of 3 genres that are common in the gaming community: Real-time Strategy, Collectible Card, and Tower Defense.
Players will be placed with troops/active skills to attack the opponent on a battlefield.
The match ends when: The player destroys the opponent's main house.
Within 3 minutes, the match will automatically terminate the game and calculate the score based on the % remaining health of the Main-tower and Sub-towers. Whoever destroys the opponent's Main Tower shall immediately win the game. If time's up and the Main Tower still remains, which side destroys more towers will become the winner.

name: Foodfight!
description:
Foodfight! is a cancelled tie-in game for the movie of the same name that was in development in 2006 for the Nintendo GameCube, Game Boy Advance and PlayStation 2. The game was shown off at E3 2006, however despite that, it's what the game was meant to be about due to the lack of gameplay footage, but is assumed to be a 3D platformer.

The game was cancelled after the movie was delayed until 2012.

name: Puzzle: Bokura no 48 Jikan Sensou
description: Sin descripción

name: QuadraPop
description: A simple and straightforward puzzle java game developed for mobile devices with multiple sequels, one of them called QuadraPop Robotic.

name: Tale of Memories
description: As the descendent of the Hero of Tarwen, your duty to your kingdom is to find and defeat its greatest villain, released after centuries of imprisonment: the Carmine Witch. On your journey, as you befriend fellow knights and civilians alike, your mission grows in complexity as you encounter the enigmatic Masked Mage, the secrets of neighboring kingdoms, and rumors of other looming threats with ties to the Carmine Witch. In the realm of Dryadales, legends, myths, and fables often prove to be true—but not always in the ways you imagined!

name: Hibernaculum
description:
A survival horror RPG by Wormwood Studios

Old School Dungeon Crawl/Survival Horror experience meets speculative fiction inspired modern take on the genre.

name: Rainbow Impostor Survivor 3D
description: In Rainbow Impostor Survivor 3D, you will play as an impostor who has been kidnapped during a school trip to an amusement park called Spooky park. From the moment of your capture, the impostor must survive five nights in the strange location that’s entirely empty of life except for you and the Rainbow Monster.

name: R-Type Tactics I & II Cosmos
description:
Outsmart and outgun your opponent in R-Type Tactics I • II Cosmos, the ultimate turn-based sci-fi strategy collection!

This two-game combination of the classic R-Type Tactics titles arrives on modern consoles for the first time, equipped with an armada of unique units to deploy across dozens of levels.

Multiple campaigns allow you to take on the Bydo Empire or even play as them yourself, while competitive online play lets you square off against others.

name: Seed of Life
description: Seed of Life is an old school action-adventure game. You play as Hope, a wolf spirit on a quest to restore natural order. In your journey, you'll be accompanied by a bird named Letty. Use both their unique skills to explore exotic places, fight formidable foes, and discover hidden secrets.

name: Seed of Life
description: Seed of Life is a relaxing puzzle game in which you create beautiful and enlightening spirographic patterns.

name: Away in the Woods
description: Away in the Woods is an upcoming RPG Maker XP game about a woman who lives alone in the woods. Spend three days, each a quarter century apart, in her shoes, learning the woods and shaping her reputation in the nearby town. What will she be known as?

name: Speed Track Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Checkers Online
description:
Play Checkers online for free!
Choose your level and favourite rules: American Checkers or International Draughts

name: Grayscale
description: Follow the story of Samael, a young man who awakens in the unfamiliar world of Libra, several years after an apocalyptic event. He is soon taken in by a settlement of survivors hoping to survive and thrive in this new, dangerous world they now call home. Join the survivors as they learn to believe in their future, despite the destruction they have witnessed.

name: Niplob Adventure
description: This game pays tribute to the best jump and runs ever made whilst adding its own flaire.

name: OviPets
description:
A virtual pet game focused on genetics and breeding!

In the world of OviPets, you and your friends are able to raise and care for pets in all the colors of the rainbow. You can research new species and splice eggs with new mutations. Pets can pass on their mutations (along with their colors and other genetic traits) to their offspring. What will you research?

name: Pokémon Topaz
description: Pokemon Topaz is a Ruby-based ROM hack created by Bazza. In the game, the character embarks on a journey through the Topaz region as a newly promoted Team Rocket executive.

name: Poker Now
description: Poker Now is free no download poker app. Just share the room link to play online private poker with your friends with play chips. Once you accept them, you are ready to play!

name: Bunni: How We First Met
description: Find love and adventure on the magical Island of Bunni! Rebuild the island, plant trees and flowers, and collect a bustling village of adorable animals. Can you marry your true love?

name: Raziel Dungeon Arena
description: Sin descripción

name: Planisphere
description:
Planisphere is a relaxing sandbox puzzle game about discovering and creating constellations.

Place stars and connect them to discover the stories of constellations or build your own.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Clone Home
description: Ratchet & Clank: Clone Home was a game for mobile phones planned to be released on September 1, 2006, however was cancelled before release. The game was a sequel to Ratchet & Clank: Going Mobile.

name: Willy Crash Mini
description: Experience the same gameplay of the original Willy Crash, just with a smaller cabinet and a 32″ screen. Willy Crash “Mini” is more than one-and-a-half feet narrower, 10 inches shallower, and almost one foot shorter than the original version. The software and even the plunger are the same; maintaining the same player experience but allowing it to fit into even more locations!

name: Willy Crash
description: Detonate the TNT plunger to launch Willy Crash into a 3D cityscape. Aim for the tops of buildings to score big and watch Willy boogie down in a lively bonus celebration! Miss and he will hilariously crash into a number of cringe-worthy, interactive obstacles. Can losing be as much fun as winning? It just might be with Willy Crash!

name: The Incredible Hulk
description:
The Incredible Hulk was supposed to be a video game created by toy and game manufacturer Parker Brothers in 1983 for the Atari 2600.

The release of The Incredible Hulk was scheduled for Autumn 1983. However, this period coincided with the video game crash of 1983 (following E.T.'s release in December 1982). During this crisis, numerous companies, including Parker Brothers, opted not to launch games that had already been developed for the Atari 2600. Consequently, The Incredible Hulk was never made available to the public.

name: The Flintstones: Dino to the Rescue
description:
The second GBA platformer developed by Tantalus, The Flintstones is a stone splitting, hard rocking, action packed challenge for all ages. The Flintstone family has been abducted and i's up to Dino to rescue them. With the help of the Great Gazoo, Dino sets off on a journey that takes him from Bedrock to the perils of a distant galaxy. It's a prehistoric adventure with everything, as Dino leaves no stone unturned to bring Fred and the gang home to safety.

Take a whirlwind downhill ride with Dino at the wheel, ride on the backs of alligators, and overcome all manner of dastardly enemies to reach your goal and save the Flintstones. The Flintstones is hours and hours of varied gameplay. It's everything you'd expect from your favorite Stone Age pet.

name: R-Beta
description: A combination of the action and difficulty of the Classic Mega Man with the exploration of an interconnected map in the best Metroidvania style.

name: Endacopia
description:
Endacopia is a nontraditional point and click adventure game for Windows and Macintosh.

“It’s like if Pajama Sam and Petscop had a baby.” -Playtester

You will be required to guide a lost child through a world that operates on foreign rules. The child’s name is “Mellow” and he doesn’t know much about anything other than the fact that he has a strong gut instinct. With a little help from his guardian angel (You!), Mellow will be able to overcome many obstacles in the way of him finding a place he can call “home”… wherever that may be.

name: Masters & Heroes
description:
Masters & Heroes is a new mobile strategy RPG. Lead your town to prosperity, build a strong squad, follow the captivating story, and fight other players.
To win, you’ll need to be smart about growing your army and choose where to put your resources and time carefully — instead of looking for your wallet. Your battles will be automatic, but the outcome will depend on your tactical decisions: choose the right gear, find the best position for your warriors, and use your items and buffs on time.

name: Control 2
description: With Control 2, we’ll take another leap into the unknown. It’ll be an unexpected journey. It’ll take a while, but to put it mildly, this is the most exciting project I’ve ever worked on. It’s still early days, but it will be worth the wait.

description: An upcoming MMORPG set within the world of Runeterra, developed by Riot Games. It was announced on December 17th, 2020 by Executive Producer Greg 'Ghostcrawler' Street. The game is currently in early development and is expected to launch in the distant future. The lore and story of the MMO will be considered canon to the League of Legends universe.

name: Tuned to Your Heart
description: Local music witch, Cinnamon, has been asked out by Freesia, a very cool ice witch. They've agreed to go eat dinner but Cinnamon has plans to make the date even better! But it has been a long time since she has been on a date! What do you even do on a date!?!?

name: The Woodsman

description: This ancient land has existed since the dawn of time, with the mystic deserts of Adalet to the north, the night-shrouded spires of Valdern to the south, and the buried ruins of civilizations long past in the west.

name: Witch Hat & Ears of Cat
description: Lianna was a young Dark Magician who, after leaving her home village, moved to the city of Eastwall, capital of the frontier beween the world known to humans and the unexplored lands to the east, region known as the World's Edge. There, she would begin a new life with a new identity while following the instructions given by her Master.

name: Morstairs: Part I - Oath of Fealty
description:
Morstairs is a western-style RPG inspired by Baldur's Gate featuring an original fantasy setting and party based, real-time with pause combat.

It is currently under part-time development by solo developer Anthony Rey with the release date listed as 'when its done'.

name: Super Mario Bros. Next
description: Super Mario Bros. Next is an upcoming single-player mod for New Super Mario Bros. 2 on the Nintendo 3DS, developed by longtime fans of the NSMB series. Featuring nine full-length worlds to explore, as well as a plethora of brand new enemies, mechanics, and power-ups, it promises to be quite the exciting adventure!

description: In a quagmire of endless war, conviction is your only way out. Explore every facet of the world, and witness a kaleidoscope of ideals.

name: Witches at Summer's End
description: Summer is ending and nothing can last forever. The Admiralo Island Witches Club meets up for one last adventure before fall begins.

name: Poseidon's Orb
description: Charlotte's been transformed into a merperson and threatened by a sea witch! To get their old life back, they'll have to steal a valuable artifact from an underwater kingdom. As they learn more about Poseidon's Orb and the merpeople of Aquatris, will Charlotte have a change of heart?

name: Doom Absolution
description: Doom Absolution is a cancelled sequel to Doom 64, announced as a project for the Nintendo 64 game console by Midway Games in cooperation with id Software shortly after the release of the first game. It was intended to be multiplayer-oriented, possibly excluding any single player elements altogether.

name: Skyscraper
description: 'Skyscraper' is a battle royale shooter game that tells the story of hikers who participated in the Super Bullet Grand Prix. Play a variety of unique Hikers, play a variety of gameplay using battle gears, and freely roam around the city through zipline and parkour to win the Super Bullet Grand Prix!

name: Tracks: The Train Set Game - Suburban Pack
description: Expand your toybox with over 30 new items to use in your worlds. Jump back into Tracks - The Train Set Game with this completely free DLC: the Suburban pack!

description: Prepare to confront pesky plants and take your battle to crazy new heights with the No-Brainerz Upgrade! Advance your zombie squad with four brain-thirsty characters, abilities, emotes, and more – it’s a no-brainer.

name: Frog Days
description: The year is 1995. Computer technology is advancing at a rapid pace and the demand for personal computers has never been higher. Leading computers into the living spaces of millions is FlamingOS, the latest version of the number one graphical user interface that both businesses and home users choose as their computer's operating system. Even your computer is running FlamingOS! However, your computer is special. Mysterious functionality allows you to explore virtual worlds hidden within the operating system and within each world you find, every new piece of data you discover, there lies clues to one of the best kept secrets of human-kind... That's right, an ancient alien conspiracy.

name: Signal & Echo: Iris is Missing
description:
A point-and-click mystery adventure with innovative detective mechanics.
Help Ollie, a fledgling journalist on his first day at the Signal & Echo newspaper, to find out what happened to missing schoolgirl Iris Wood.

name: Candleman: Definitive Edition
description: Candleman is a distinctive action adventure story entwined with low-light gameplay. Acting as a little candle who can burn for only 10 seconds, now three new chapters bring the story to its thought-provoking finale. Once again the little candle journeys through the darkest depths. Will he find his way to the illuminating light?

name: Kirameki Paradise
description: Customize your new life by creating a one-of-a-kind “I”! The texture and reality reproduced like the real thing bring the feeling and experience as if you were there. Make your dreams come true, find the beauty and meaning that only you can create, and live your own shining self without being bound by the rules of the world.

name: De Blob Online
description: De Blob Online was a game being developed by Balanced Worlds. The only reason this game is known to exist is because of a tweet made by Richard Brown, who used to work at THQ. This game gives players the ability to play as a customisable character and explore a small city somewhere in Raydia.
