name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation - Co-Op Map Pack
description: Grab a friend (or two or three!) for some epic battles on 9 brand new maps designed specifically for cooperative play.

name: Armored Warfare: Revolution General Pack
description: General’s Bundle: Revolution

name: Armored Warfare: K21 General Pack
description: General’s Bundle: K21

name: Armored Warfare: Free Globalization Pack
description: Claim your free Armored Warfare gift, celebrating the launch of the Global Server. Available for a limited time only!

name: Armored Warfare: BMPT Standard Pack
description: The BMPT Mod.2000 Tier 8 Premium Tank Destroyer is now available to improve your in-game progression

name: Epic Warrior: The Sword of Light
description:
Epic Warrior: The Sword of Light is a tale of a young warrior that sets out to find the Sword of Light and vanquish the evil that has poisoned the land.
You, like our hero, will experience first hand what it feels like to enter the unknown. You will encounter and fight over 40 monsters, that will use weapons and numerous spells in their attempt to destroy you.

name: Everlove: Rose
description: Everlove is a narrative game of Romance and Mystery where each choice you make builds your character and brings you closer to one of your four possible romantic liaisons. In solving the complex mystery of who killed your father, will you find love?

name: Warbirds Spitfire
description: Warbirds-Spitfire is a 3d WWII air combat game, a flight sim with accelerometer control, photo-realistic scene, and battle missions based on true history.

name: Block Hopper
description:
Help the spunky and optimistic robot, Bit, avoid certain doom by placing Blocks in this exciting 2D puzzle/platformer! Place them wisely as you run, hop, and think your way to the Goal of Block Hopper!
Inspired by the great platformers of yesteryear, Block Hopper has Bit, and he will have to use moving platforms, conveyor belts, springboards, disappearing blocks, and switches that activate different kinds of gates.

name: Defenders of Tetsoidea: Chrono Chonus
description: A contemporary turn based RPG where it is your task to figure out why a demon invasion is suddenly happening, and battle against it.

name: Dicey Birdball
description: Dicey Birdball is a strategy sports game where you manage a team of birds playing football. Roll dice and assign them to your athletes to maneuver, score goals, and earn seeds to improve your team.

name: Dungeons Diced
description: Be Tactical! buy gear and crawl the dungeons. Death is permanent. Classes are very different! a new combat system, different than anything you've seen before!

name: Echo Divide
description: Explore unique worlds, fight demons and save the world in this open world hack and slash hybrid.

name: Edge Islands
description: Build your colony, train your team, explore and engage in turn-based tactical battles to protect and expand your domain! Shape unique stories by managing moods, relationships and ambitions in your group of adventurers.

name: Exostation
description: Exostation is a sci-fi real-time strategy game. Reach sustainable planet economies by building, allocating, mining, and selling wisely. Allow humanity to spread and conquer new solar systems not by war but by ensuring its planet's resources are not exhausted.

name: Fallen Enchantress: Map Pack
description: Play on maps designed by Stardock. They introduce new challenges, dangerous threats and worlds to explore.

name: Fallen Knight: Rebellion of the Fallen
description: Save Oracle from a tragic fate and battle the Knights of the Round. As Lancelot, engage in fast-paced combat in an action-heavy rush and rescue mission.

name: Fall of Bali
description: Fall of Bali is a historical strategy simulator city set in Bali set around 19th century. Divided in many kingdoms after fall of Bali Empire, Bali has fall in warring era for nearly 2 centuries and now the threat of imperialism come. With all your kingdom potential, can you survive and win this era?

name: Farewell
description: Farewell is an adventure game about people who are dragged into a fantasy world when a situation overwhelms them. They will have to fight against their own fears in order to get out of there.

name: Farming Simulator 19: Kverneland & Vicon Equipment Pack
description: Expand your farming experience with the new official extension for Farming Simulator 19! This huge DLC contains 20 pieces of equipment from the Kverneland group.

name: Farm Manager 2021: Floriculture
description: Start growing ornamental flowers on your farm. Mix plants to achieve new color combinations and increase the visual appeal of your crops.

name: Firefly Cove
description: Firefly Cove is a cozy open-ended dragon magic-ranch RPG! You’ve been brought to a parallel dimension by the forest spirit. Will you become a great magician, make new friends, and more? With a little spirit you might be the one whispered in legends.

name: First Blood: Persian Legends
description: First Blood : Persian Legends is a linear story-driven real-time-tactic strategy game based on ancient Persia, Sassanid Empire. Our story is heavily inspired by true events. Can you help saving the Sassanid Empire from within?

name: Final Boss
description: Final Boss is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This game will immerse you headlong into the story of a guy who meets a nice girl at a party. This girl turned out to be a sexy girl who loves sex very much.

name: Fishing Planet: Golden Pack
description: You get all the awesome Advanced & Deluxe tackle in their Golden edition, but also the most powerful Golden fishing equipment: including TEN monstrously powerful Golden Edition rod and reel combos, a set of prime quality Golden Edition fishing apparel and the awesome cherry-on-top Golden Kayak!

name: Fishing Planet: Crappie Valentine Pack
description: Valentine's Day is a day to celebrate love and devotion to your one & only true passion - Fishing! And what better way to add more spark to this everlasting romance than to engage in a challenging tournament? Well...to win it, of course!

name: The Fisherman: Fishing Planet - Trophy Catch Pack
description: It’s time to score BIG with some real Trophies! All you need is skills, patience, persistence and the Trophy Catch Pack to maximize your chances of landing trophy-sized fish!

name: Fishing Planet: World Bass Tour Pack
description: Compete in catching the most popular American fish species with the help of World Bass Tour Pack, a set of tournament tackle carefully designed for the true bass professionals.

name: Fishing Planet: Golden Dragon Pack
description: Golden Dragon Pack featuring a deadly combination of tackle, equipment and even a Kayak - all decorated in the theme of the world’s most powerful legendary creature - the Golden Dragon Pack will back you with the support of ancient omnipotent forces!

name: Fishing Planet: Deluxe Pack
description: Skyrocket your angling progress and treat yourself to a truly deluxe fishing experience with the deluxe FP Pack! The Deluxe FP Pack features seven powerful Deluxe Edition rod and reel combos, along with superb Deluxe Edition fishing apparel!

name: Flempire
description: Flempire is a mix of 1. person action shooting and RTS in a fantasy world. Switch between having the full overview of the entire battlefield, constructing buildings, controlling groups of units, or choose to be in the middle of it, become a rank-an-file unit or a hero with special abilities.
